name: The Macallan
description: One of the world's most collectible distilleries known for its exceptional sherry cask matured single malts.

name: Lagavulin
description: Known for its distinctively robust and smoky malt whiskies. A true Islay icon.

name: Yamazaki
description: Japan's first commercial whisky distillery, producing internationally acclaimed single malts with a distinctive Japanese character.

name: Highland Park
description: The northernmost Scottish distillery, known for its balanced profile of gentle smoke, rich fruit, and honey sweetness.

name: Springbank
description: One of the few distilleries to perform every step of the whisky-making process on site. Known for complex, oily character with light peat influence.
